page.title: 14Local news
page.content: Shown here are the entries for Hilmarton for June and July, from our local newspaper,The Wiltshire Gazette and Herald. The Happy Circle Over 60 Club went on their annual trip to Weymouth on June 26 1985. Jenny Mitchinson and Linda Lines,from Hilmarton School, went to Dunster Castle on June 27th to give a cheque for Â£126.50 to Princess Anne for Save The Children Fund. On June 23,strawberry cream teas were served by Brenda Reeves and helpers in Hilmarton W.I. hall.Â£70 was raised for the St.Laurence's Church Roof Fund. Mrs Elsie Rose Lane,aged 73 of 1 Whitcomb Cottages died at the Princess Margaret's Hostpital, Swindon on July 4.She was buried at St.Laurence's Church, Hilmarton.
